entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
